item.title: 【32位系统传参】BUUCTF picoctf_2018_rop chain
item.description: Sometimes being a friend means mastering the art of timing. There is a time for silence. A time to let go and allow people to hurl themselves into their own destiny. And a time to prepare to pick up the pieces when it’s all over. — Octavia E. Butler 原题链接 checksec ida 解题思路很简单，先后调用win_func
